name: PeopleSoft: Related Language tables must have the same key structure as the table with the addition of the field LANGUAGE_CD.
description: List all Language Records that don't have the field LANGUAGE_CD in the key and all Language Records that don't have the same list of field in the key as in the base Record.
rationale: As PeopleSoft generates automatically the SQL query to handle multi-language, the related language table must have the same key structure as the table with the addition of the field LANGUAGE_CD.
total: Number of PeopleSoft Lang record tables
